name: Starr Mirror
description:
A little arcade game, initially made in RPG Maker 2003 for the RPG Maker Game in 1 hour jam (jam edition here). 

This has been remade in GMS2 for educational purposes, and is bug-less, as far as I'm aware, contrary to the RM2k3 version. You have 3 minutes to collect as many stars as you can!
Don't hesitate to post your score :)

Arrows to move, SPACE to jump.
